Name: Moon Shall Be My Guest
Description: You meet Xiangli Yao again under the Wishing Tree. Yet, this time you share a walk not for others' wishes but for the moon's glory and the bustling lives of people.
QuestDesc: You meet Xiangli Yao again under the Wishing Tree. Yet, this time you share a walk not for others' wishes but for the moon's glory and the bustling lives of people.

Conditions.PreQuestName: Chasing the Moon, Here and Now

Options.PlotLineKey: Xiangli Yao? What are you doing here...
Still working on unfulfilled wishes from the Moontree Lodge?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not exactly. Thanks to you, every wish has been fulfilled.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for what I'm doing... Consider it some kind of after-sales service.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I light and hang the fulfilled wishes. When the wisher cannot do it themselves, I do it for them.

Options.PlotLineKey: You should have counted me in!
Let me help you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then we can do it together next year. I had just finished with the last one before you arrived.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Most of the fulfilled wishes had already been put up during the festival. There weren't many left from the beginning.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry about it. You've already been a huge help. It's your first time celebrating Moon-Chasing Festival in Jinzhou, you deserve to have more fun.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can handle the rest on my own.

Options.PlotLineKey: Nice! I'll enjoy the festival, then!
Let me help. I happen to have some time to spare.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, you deserve to have fun and rewind. Taking a necessary break is not a waste of time. Don't let this opportunity pass you by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you've been busy since your first day in Jinzhou. If you have some time to spare, that's more the reason to save that time for yourself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Time files when we're having fun.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the festivities wind down, the Moonlit Fair's stalls remain open. Perhaps you'd like to visit for one last round? You may even find some deals and specials at this time.

Options.PlotLineKey: You really know a lot about the Moonlit Fair.
Now you sound like a real pro at this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Having been to the fair every year, I always make time to explore the stalls that catch my interest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stay with us in Jinzhou for a couple more years, then I'm sure you'll become very familiar with the fair too.

Options.PlotLineKey: Really? I thought you'd be doing researches instead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, indeed I find joy in scientific research. Immersing myself in data and theories, verifying various possibilities... It's a blissful experience.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But sometimes, taking a break from work to join the jubilant crowd brings a different kind of joy.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then which one is your favorite stall so far?
Any personal recommendations?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My favorite stall? You've probably been there already. Hmm, but if I have to choose one... Shall I just show you in person?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xiangli Yao leads you to a certain place...

Options.PlotLineKey: Is that the Moon Shooter game over there?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. I remember you seemed to enjoy it last time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, with your exceptional prowess in combat, I bet you're good at shooting too?

Options.PlotLineKey: There’s still room for improvement. I’m not even in the first place.
Yep, I'm confident in my shooting skills.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then, may I suggest something more challenging?

Options.PlotLineKey: Tell me more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Moon Shooter is very popular. While the stall owner changes the targets daily, the frequent use has caused some wear and tear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why we need to lower the muzzle a bit. Make it easier to hit the bull's eye.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now here's the exciting part: rotate the gun slightly and align it with the rabbit's ear, then you may hit two targets simultaneously. It's all about finding the right angle, and the bullet might rebound toward the next one.

Options.PlotLineKey: Hitting two targets... at once?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. You'll need to use the right angle and utilize the momentum. It's kind of like stone skipping.

Options.PlotLineKey: That's new.
Sounds pretty crazy. You sure it's possible?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I first tried it two years ago. On a good day, I could hit three targets at once.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They've been using my record as a promotional gimmick, offering an exclusive souvenir to anyone who can break it.

Options.PlotLineKey: An exclusive souvenir? Now we're talking...
So the record holder is here right before me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good. I was a bit worried it wouldn’t interest you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With {PlayerName} as the new challenger, I may not hold that record for long.

Options.PlotLineKey: Have you ever tried one-shotting all the targets?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... If I were to try that, I'd have to calculate the bullet trajectory to two decimal places.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Which technically isn't impossible with my prosthetic hand... but I'll probably get banned from ever playing again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I'll stick to using my left hand to keep it a safe and fair competition.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, jokes aside, I value the process more than the outcome. To me, it's all about having a good time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, this isn't a scientific inquiry, and there's no end goal. We're here to enjoy ourselves, and I want to do that to the fullest. What do you think, {PlayerName}?

Options.PlotLineKey: Can't agree more.
Of course. That's the whole point!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Glad we're on the same page. Can I make a request, then? Will you join me for next year's Moon-Chasing Festival, {PlayerName}?

Options.PlotLineKey: Seriously?
We're making plans together for next year already?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You heard me. The idea came to me as we gazed at the moon, side by side. While I'm not sure where you'll be, or what you'll be doing then... I want to invite you anyway.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m not planning to have you help me with the wishes at Moontree Lodge again. Maybe we'll try another game of Moon Shooting, or go sample some new treats at Yumyum Haven. Or we'll just follow the crowd, and see where it takes us...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though it's still a long time before next year's celebration, I can't help but imagine what we might do together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't have a specific plan yet, but with you, {PlayerName}... I have a feeling it's going to be fun.

Options.PlotLineKey: Since you've put it that way...
Now I do have some ideas for next year.
(I want to try something different...)
(I'll accept Xiangli Yao's invitation...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. So this is the wish you made for next year's Moon-Chasing Festival.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the caretaker of Moontree Lodge, and as Xiangli Yao...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiangli Yao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I promise to make it come true.
